overview: Hazim is a shy delivery guy in his 20s and Ayang, his bubbly neighbour works as part-time cleaner for a social influencer. They have mental issues and being interrogated by an officer, who is investigated the murder of Ayang's mother. Fueled by their own motive for the murder, the interrogator must find out who comitted the crime. As they recollect their thoughts on what transpired that fateful night, the lives of the both of them are unraveled in the most bizzare and peculiar way.
title: Kabus
